name: Medieval Arms
description:
If you are looking for a game where it's about your speed and reaction time, then this game is for you! There are no spells, skills, or special abilties to cast, it is all about aim, attacking and dodging at the right time.

In this game you fight versus NPCs / AI. You can choose from three different classes to play as, either the Knight, Man-At-Arms or the Ranger.

Main objective of the game is to fight NPCs as well as holding flags around the map to win.

Key Features:

  • Four different maps to choose from.

  • Fight the enemies 1 vs 1 or 100 vs 100


  • Three different classes; Knight, Man-At-Arms or the Ranger.

  • Destructible environment.


  • Ragdolls.


  • Variety of skills; dodge rolling, blocking and kicking.

  • Varied maps; the maps to designed for different scenarios such as close quarter combat, and larger maps supporting more NPCs.

  • Ragdolls and small amount of gore: watch your victim's limbs and bodies fly as you defeat and decimate them.
